author: ivaynberg
msg: changed getMarkupId() to always return page-relative-path instead of trying to access component's attributes because its causing too much pain when components are inside listviews/borders

author: jonl
msg: Moved logic for metadata searching from duplicate locations in (Component and Application) into the MetaDataKey class.  This reduces the size and complexity of Component and Application and will keep the code in sync when fixng bugs.

author: jonl
msg: Removed ISecuritySettings.get/setSignInPage() and special magic in default unauthorized component instantiation handler.  Fixed library application by installing a specific handler for that application's needs.  In general, we will want to take an approach similar to wicket-auth-roles-examples authentication.examples package rather than trying to embed the rules for authentication into the security settings object.
